title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Motability Operations' unified backup strategy: From fragmented to fortified
title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Motability Operations的统一备份策略：从分散到强化
abstract: Discover how Motability Operations, the UK's largest accessible vehicle leasing organization, transformed their fragmented backup environment into a unified, ransomware-resilient architecture using AWS Backup. Learn about their implementation of a distributed, multi-account strategy aligned with the 3-2-1-0 resilience framework, incorporating automated daily restore testing and ransomware scanning. This session explores how they achieved continuous validation of critical data, ensuring clean recovery points are always available to meet strict RTO and RPO targets. Gain insights into evolving from basic backup processes to assured recovery capabilities that protect against modern ransomware threats.
abstract_cn: 了解英国最大的无障碍车辆租赁组织 Motability Operations 如何使用 AWS Backup 将其分散的备份环境转变为统一的抗勒索软件架构。了解他们如何实施符合 3-2-1-0 弹性框架的分布式多账户策略，并结合自动化每日恢复测试和勒索软件扫描。本次会议探讨了他们如何实现关键数据的持续验证，确保始终有干净的恢复点可用，以满足严格的 RTO 和 RPO 目标。深入了解如何从基本备份流程演进到有保障的恢复能力，以抵御现代勒索软件威胁。
